UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: nNOS inhibition, antimicrobial and anticancer activity of the amphibian skin peptide, citropin 1.1 and synthetic modifications. The solution structure of a modified citropin 1.1.
Literature.Author: Doyle J, Brinkworth CS, Wegener KL, Carver JA, Llewellyn LE, Olver IN, Bowie JH, Wabnitz PA, Tyler MJ

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptide defenses against chytridiomycosis, an emerging infectious disease of amphibian populations.
Literature.Author: Rollins-Smith LA, Conlon JM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus(MIC=100µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=100µg/ml),Leuconostoc lactis(MIC=1.5µg/ml),Listeria innocua(MIC=12µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=25µg/ml),Pasteurella multocida(MIC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=3µg/ml),Streptococcus uberis(MIC=12µg/ml),Batrachochytrium dendrobatidis(MIC=100-200µM)
